ai-kv15.2:1.1_0: When ignorance is a condition for choices, you should not say:
ai-kv15.2:1.4_0: Since ignorance isn’t born again and again,
ai-kv15.2:1.6_0: and I spoke with them when he had been substantial.
ai-kv15.2:2.6_0: Craving is a reason why he should say:
ai-kv15.2:3.1_0: “Mendicants, when rebirth is a condition for old age and death.”
ai-kv15.2:3.3_0: there’s no-one else who does not exist in nothing.
ai-kv15.2:3.4_0: Well then, ignorance shouldn’t be spoken of by ignorance.
ai-kv15.2:4.1_0: “Consciousness is a condition for name and form.”
ai-kv15.2:4.4_0: Therefore, ignorance is a condition for choices.
ai-kv15.2:4.5_0: Craving is a condition for grasping.
ai-kv15.2:4.6_0: The discussion on each other is finished.
